SELECT dept_id as deptId, count(dept_id) as countNumber FROM report WHERE r_from_date = #{fromdate} AND r_to_date = #{todate} AND status_m_sub = #{status} GROUP BY dept_id
select * from report where dept_name = #{depName} and status_l_sub=1 order by author_name,r_from_date

SELECT * FROM report WHERE author_id = #{authorId} AND YEARWEEK(date_format(r_from_date,'%Y-%m-%d'),1) = YEARWEEK(now(),1) AND YEARWEEK(date_format(r_to_date,'%Y-%m-%d'),1) = YEARWEEK(now(),1)

SELECT author_id, ANY_VALUE(author_name) as author_name, ANY_VALUE(dept_id) as dept_id, ANY_VALUE(dept_name) as dept_name, AVG(score) as score FROM report WHERE status_l_sub=1 And (date_format(r_from_date,'%Y-%m')=date_format(now(),'%Y-%m') OR date_format(r_to_date,'%Y-%m')=date_format(now(),'%Y-%m')) group by author_id;
